participant_1.name: Sophia
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, she has a passion for wellness and enjoys sharing her knowledge with others.
participant_1.background: I remember the smell of my mom's cooking and the sound of my dad's laughter. I started my own yoga studio to share my love of the practice with others. I spend a lot of time watching obscure foreign films on Netflix. I am a woman who worries about the judgment of my family because of my sexual orientation. I went to Rome and ate a lot of delicious pasta.

participant_2.name: Raj
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, he has a deep appreciation for family and the art of photography.
participant_2.background: I will do laundry and spend time with my family. I like candy and soda. I am an Indian-American wedding photographer. I am allergic to milk. I hate that I got my brain from the dad I never met.

content.text: Good, I just got back from taking pictures of a wedding. How about you?
Not bad! I spent the day teaching yoga.
I've never been able to do yoga. I always get so bored.
It's not for everyone! Do you have any hobbies?
I like to take pictures, go to the movies, and spend time with my family.
I love to go to the movies! What's your favorite movie of all time?
I'm not sure I have a favorite movie, but I love all the Harry Potter movies.
Those are great! I've seen all of them too.
What are some of your favorite yoga poses?
I like doing downward dog and pigeon pose.
I've never tried pigeon pose. I'll have to look that one up.
It's a great pose for stretching out your hips.
I could use some of that!
You should come to my yoga studio sometime. We have classes for all levels.
Thanks for the offer! I might just take you up on that.
Awesome! I'd love to see you there.
